system.description:
This type comprises vegetable creatures. Note that regular plants, such as one finds growing in gardens and fields, lack Wisdom and Charisma scores and are not creatures but objects, even though they are alive.

Features: 8-sided Hit Dice; base attack bonus equal to Â¾ total Hit Dice (as cleric); good Fortitude saves. Some plant creatures are mindless and gain no skill points or feats.

Traits: Plants breathe and eat, but do not sleep; proficient with natural weapons only; not subject to critical hits; immunity to poison, sleep, paralysis, polymorph, stunning, and mind-affecting effects; low-light vision.
